content: **friends a video version of this pattern is available on my youtube channel for free english language https //www youtube com/watch v=oyc1temcuqc german https //www youtube com/watch v=ecm18dtfhys** this pdf file contains written instruction 19 step by step photos and a link to a video version of this crochet pattern and consists of 8 pages pattern written in english using us terminology and german skill level intermediate the skills you need for this pattern are - basics of crochet- chain slip_stitch single_crochet increase 2single crochet in 1 st decrease single_crochet two together working in the round dimensions of finished item varies as any weight of yarn and hook can be used you have permission to sell items made from my pattern in your on-line shops i only ask of you to give a link to the pattern or link to my pattern shop please do not copy distribute rewrite or resale this pattern or any of the images from this pattern
